verbose_text: To confirm sEV-PS induction, we treated HFFF2s with increasing concentrations of sEVs derived from iRAS compared to the highest dose of sEVs from iC and observed a dose dependent senescent response by quantifying the percentage of cells staining positive for SA-beta-Gal and the levels of p53 + and BrdU + cells by IF (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY B and S1C).
